DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to evaluate the effectiveness and patient satisfaction with the use of oxybutynin at low doses for treating axillary hyperhidrosis in a large series of patients.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Oxybutynin to Treat Axillary Hyperhidrosis
DOC.criteria: patients with axillary hyperhidrosis glaucoma and micturition disorders, pregnancy
